job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Arts & Science, Engineering or similar

jd: From: bala, Millennium Infotech bala@mitiweb.com Reply to: bala@mitiweb.com Hi Professional,Hope you are doing well.We are looking for Senior Business System Analyst with Sharepoint Experience.Must be from Canada location.Kindly don't send US Candidate profiles. Must have 10+ years of experience. Job Description:RequirementMinimum 10 years of experience working as a Senior Systems Analyst in a company of similar sizePossess a Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Arts & Science, Engineering or similarMinimum of six (6) years’ experience as a Senior Systems Analyst working on full projects lifecycles (from initiation to closure)Minimum of five (5) years’ experience as a business analyst gathering and documenting business and technical requirements via various techniquesExperience working in a large and decentralized organization, preferably in a University settingExperience managing large-scale and complex IT transformation projectsExperience preparing and presenting high quality slide decks to various committees and stakeholders, including senior executivesFamiliarity with accessibility needs (e.g. physical, technological, sensory, and communication), preferably in an education settingExperience working with Agile teamsExperience with SharePoint tools (lists creations, and dashboards), Teams and Azure DevOps with no supervisionFamiliarity with AODA
